body: Reshaped and renamed by generations of developers and gentrifiers, the borders of New York City's neighborhoods are often hazy at best. title: Amateur Mapmakers Redraw Boundaries, Working Online

body: For much of the past century, Brooklyn was the Rodney Dangerfield of boroughs, known for its blue-collar style, for its funny accent and, of course, for getting no respect. title: As Brooklyn Gentrifies, Some Neighborhoods Are Being Left Behind

title: Brooklyn's Gold Rush

body: It's easy to fall in love with a neighborhood in New York. And given the high cost of housing, it's common to realize that you can't afford the home you want in the neighborhood you love.
